text: But when Judas reached the flowing wadi, he stationed the officers of the people beside it and gave them this order: “Do not allow anyone to encamp; all must go into battle.”
Give to the one who asks of you, and do not turn your back on one who wants to borrow. Love of Enemies.
The girl, a child of twelve, arose immediately and walked around. [At that] they were utterly astounded.
moreover, I know that you do not have the love of God in you.
And all day long, both at the temple and in their homes, they did not stop teaching and proclaiming the Messiah, Jesus.
